name: Blue Saber
body:
![BlueSaber](http://a1.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple49/v4/7b/58/4b/7b584b21-a4c9-580d-8b80-cb77362d41d3/icon175x175.jpeg) ### Download [App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/blue-saber-the-lightsaber-app/id1076077872?mt=8)
### About Simulate a lightsaber on your iPhone for free! Complete with vibrations, flashlights, animations and sounds, this app delivers a complete simulation of a blue saber! May the force be with you!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
